definitions: involving or characterized by conflict or opposition

examples.text: industry and government had an adversarial relationship

shortDefinitions: involving or characterized by conflict or opposition

examples.text: the reviewer’s presumed adversarial relationship to his subject

definitions: (of a trial or legal procedure) in which the parties in a dispute have the responsibility for finding and presenting evidence

examples.text: equality between prosecution and defense is essential in an adversarial system of justice

shortDefinitions: (of trial or legal proceedings) in which parties in dispute have responsibility for finding and presenting evidence
